summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx for shipping services provided to NYSG LLC. It details the charges incurred, including transportation and handling fees, and provides information on payment due dates and contact details for inquiries.

persons.name: Johnny Ciampi
persons.context: Johnny Ciampi is listed as the sender associated with the shipment referenced in the invoice.

events.title: FedEx Shipment Pickup
events.description: A FedEx shipment was picked up on December 22, 2004.

events.title: FedEx Delivery
events.description: The FedEx shipment was delivered on December 29, 2004.

locations: 1075 West Georgia Street, Suite 2600, Vancouver, BC V6E 3C9, CA
keyFacts: The invoice number is 7-687-94151, dated December 31, 2004.
Total charges for the shipment amounted to USD $17.80.
The invoice indicates a discount of $6.75 applied to the total charges.
The sender's address is listed as 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY.
The invoice includes a due date for payment by January 15, 2005.
